effect_entries.effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have defeated themselves in the Pokéathlon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have defeated themselves in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケスロンの　記録が　はいっている。
ポケモンの　自滅した　回数が
記録された　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a
card that shows how many times
your Pokémon impeded themselves.

Contiene i tuoi dati Pokéathlon.
Su questa Scheda è registrato il numero di
punti persi.

Esfera cristalina encontrada bajo tierra. A pesar
de estar cubierta de roca y tierra, su belleza es
increíble.

Speichert deine Pokéathlon-Rekorde. Die Karte
zeigt, wie viele Punktabzüge dein Team
kassiert hat.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre de points
perdus par vos Pokémon.

포켓슬론의 기록이 들어 있다.
포켓몬이 자멸한 횟수가
기록된 카드.

ポケスロンの　きろくが　はいっている。
ポケモンの　じめつした　かいすうが
きろくされた　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon impeded themselves.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon impeded themselves.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre
de points perdus par vos Pokémon.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
